bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
